title: Prince
cast: Shammi Kapoor, Vyjayantimala, Rajendra Nath, Ajit, Helen, Leela Chitnis, Parveen Choudhary, Sudhir, Sunder, Rashid Khan
description: To better himself, a spoiled prince temporarily assumes a commoner’s identity. But he soon learns his palace has been gifted to his father’s new wife.

title: True Grit
cast: John Wayne, Glen Campbell, Kim Darby, Jeremy Slate, Robert Duvall, Dennis Hopper, Alfred Ryder, Strother Martin, Jeff Corey
description: Teenage tomboy Mattie Ross enlists the help of crusty lawman Rooster Cogburn to track down the hired hand who murdered her father.
